headline: Assessing Medtronic (MDT) Valuation After Recent Share Price Moves And Long Term Return Trends
summary: Medtronic (MDT) is back on investors’ radar after recent share price moves, with the stock closing at $98.60 on Tuesday. That price now serves as a reference point for how you might think about its latest returns. See our latest analysis for Medtronic. Recent price moves sit against a mixed backdrop, with the 1 day share price return of 1.9% and 7 day share price return of 2.3% contrasting with a flat 30 day share price return. At the same time, the 1 year total shareholder return of 15.1%...
